name: Chazz and the Rap Band, 2
description:
After last year's raging success that was the nearly unplayable CHAZZ 1, the World's Greatest Rapper is back for more!

And this time there's actually rap taking place!

Chazz is never satisfied. Even after taking down Kim Jong Un, he must seek new thrills... And that is why the band goes to space!

Dodge flying pizza to the rhythm!!!
